plugins.name: strategy-toolkit

plugins.name: repo-structure
plugins.description: Enterprise-grade repository structure analyzer, validator, and scaffolder with intelligent automation

plugins.name: product-management
plugins.description: Write feature specs, plan roadmaps, synthesise user research, and analyse competitors. Full PM workflow covered.

plugins.name: productivity
plugins.description: Task management, workplace memory, and a visual dashboard. Claude learns your people, projects, and terminology. Works in any project type.

plugins.name: productivity-cockpit
plugins.description: Task management, workplace memory, and an interactive cockpit dashboard with built-in AI chatbot. Works in any project type.

plugins.name: plugin-studio
plugins.description: Visual dashboard for creating and managing Claude Code plugins — browse structure, edit components, validate, and scaffold new plugins from a browser UI.
